benchmark_details.name: MMG IC (Multimodal Multi-Grained Concept Annotations)
benchmark_details.overview: MMG IC is a new dataset featuring multimodal multi-grained concept annotations for Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs). It aims to improve performance in vision-language tasks by integrating fine-grained and coarse-grained concept annotations.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To explore the potential of multi-grained concept annotations for MLLMs and improve vision-language alignment through a comprehensive dataset.

data.source: Open Images, Objects365, V3Det, Visual Genome
data.size: 3.5M unique images, 23.9M unique object regions, 61.8M category label-description pairs
data.annotation: Manual annotations from public object detection datasets

methods: Evaluation on multimodal comprehension and generation benchmarks
Supervised fine-tuning with MMG IC and other datasets
methodology.calculation: Metrics calculated based on model predictions compared to ground truth.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better performance on the respective benchmarks.
methodology.validation: Evaluation against multiple vision-language benchmarks in zero-shot settings.
